text: Oh nina enikholwayo! ngempela baningi abangama-Rabbi (izifundiswa) nama-Monk (amaRoma angaganiwe) ahlala esigodlweni abadla ingcebo yabantu ngokungemthetho futhi bevimbela (abantu) endleleni kaMvelinqangi kanye nalabo abaqongelela igolide nesiliva bengalisebenzisa endleleni kaMvelinqangi ngakho-ke batshene ngesijeziso esibuhlungu
